definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Routine laboratory tests frequently indicate a relative lymphocytosis in uncomplicated parotitis.
sentences.chinese: 实验室常规检查常显示淋巴细胞相对增多。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of moxibustion on subgroup of T-cells of AIDS patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察灸法对AIDS患者T淋巴细胞亚群的影响。

sentences.english: At detecting T lymphocytes of animal, the red cells of sev…
sentences.chinese: 豚鼠淋巴细胞与兔红细胞结合率高。

sentences.english: Lymph cells from the spleens were served for lymphoproliferation assay.
sentences.chinese: 取脾组织行淋巴细胞增殖试验。

sentences.english: Honeysuckle can accelerate lymphocyte transformation and strengthen phagocytic function of white blood cell.
sentences.chinese: 金银花能促进淋巴细胞转化，增强白细胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: MLR after transplantation was negative , and it turned into be positive 5 months later.
sentences.chinese: 移植后混合淋巴细胞反应为阴性，5个月后转为阳性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of extract of Cactus on the proliferate of T-lymphocyte in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨仙人掌提取物对小鼠T淋巴细胞增殖的影响。

sentences.english: Lymphocyte production in mammals originates in the bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳动物淋巴细胞在骨髓产生。

sentences.english: Here is the microscopic appearance of a viral pneumonia with interstitial lymphocytic infiltrates.
sentences.chinese: 病毒性肺炎间质淋巴细胞浸润。

sentences.english: Blood was sampled from rat eyes and the count of lymphocytes in peripheral blood were detected.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠经摘眼球取血，进行淋巴细胞分类计数。

sentences.english: Methods:Karyotype analysis of the peripheral blood lymphocytes were carried out with G-banding.
sentences.chinese: 方法取受检者外周血淋巴细胞培养，G显带核型分析。

sentences.english: Routine laboratory tests frequently indicate a relative lymphocytosis.
sentences.chinese: 实验室常规检查常显示淋巴细胞相对增多。

sentences.english: They promote the proliferation of PHA, ConA or LPS-activated lymphocytes.
sentences.chinese: 有促进活化的淋巴细胞增殖的效应。

sentences.english: Peripheral blood Iymphocytes of patients with multiple myeloma were examined by using anti idiotype antibodies.
sentences.chinese: 用该抗体检测了所对应患者的外周血淋巴细胞。

sentences.english: Shi junzhitiang could remarkably increase T lymphocytes percentage in peripheral blood.
sentences.chinese: 四君子汤可显著增加外周血T淋巴细胞百分比。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the molecular cytogenetic characteristics in patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解慢性淋巴细胞白血病的分子遗传学特性。

definition: neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)

pinyin: shi4 suan1 xing4 li4 xi4 bao1

definition: phagocyte (cell that ingests and destroys foreign matter)
